amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.catchline: Board of Regents; chief executive officer; chief administrative officers; appointment.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The chief executive officer of the University of Nebraska shall be appointed by the Board of Regents, hold office at the pleasure of the board, and receive such compensation as the board may prescribe.

(2) The University of Nebraska-Lincoln, the University of Nebraska at Omaha, the University of Nebraska at Kearney, the University of Nebraska Medical Center, and any other postsecondary educational institution designated by the Legislature to be a part of the University of Nebraska shall be governed by the Board of Regents, and each shall be managed and administered in the manner prescribed by the board. The chief administrative officer of each such postsecondary educational institution shall be appointed, hold office, and be compensated as prescribed by the Board of Regents.
